mapper.select: SELECT id as donaId , topic_big as topicBig , topic_small as topicSmall , title , location , edate , ddate , target , target_in as targetIn , image_main as imageMain , image_sub as imageSub , comment , content , reword_coin as rewardCoin , view , rdate FROM contents WHERE topic_big = 'D' ORDER BY ddate DESC

SELECT id as donaId , topic_big as topicBig , topic_small as topicSmall , title , location , edate , ddate , target , target_in as targetIn , image_main as imageMain , image_sub as imageSub , comment , content , reword_coin as rewardCoin , view , rdate FROM contents WHERE topic_big = 'D' ORDER BY (target_in / target) ASC LIMIT 3

SELECT id as donaId , topic_big as topicBig , topic_small as topicSmall , title , location , edate , ddate , target , target_in as targetIn , image_main as imageMain , image_sub as imageSub , comment , content , reword_coin as rewardCoin , view , rdate FROM contents WHERE id=#{donaId}

SELECT id AS donaId, title, image_main AS imageMain, image_sub AS imageSub, comment, content FROM contents WHERE topic_big = 'D' AND ddate >= CURDATE() -- 오늘보다 크거나 같은 날짜 AND (target_in < target) -- 인원이 차지 않은 경우만 포함 ORDER BY edate ASC LIMIT 3;
